title: Pogačar Calls Out ‘Unbeatable’ Hype Ahead of Giro d’Italia: ‘It’s Not Respectful to Other Riders’
content:
In spicy comments ahead of the Giro start, the UAE star shoots down suggestions he will win easily: 'It's bullsh*t.'

Read the full article at Pogačar Calls Out ‘Unbeatable’ Hype Ahead of Giro d’Italia: ‘It’s Not Respectful to Other Riders’ on Velo.
author: ahood
